com.adobe.cq.social.commons.comments.api

Class AbstractCommentCollection<C extends Comment,T extends CommentCollectionConfiguration>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.adobe.cq.social.scf.core.BaseSocialComponent
      • com.adobe.cq.social.commons.comments.api.AbstractCommentCollection<C,T>
  • Type Parameters:
    C - any SocialComponent type that extends the Comment data type.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    CommentCollection<C,T>, SocialCollectionComponent, SocialComponent
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbstractFileLibrary, AbstractForum, AbstractReviewCollection

    public abstract class AbstractCommentCollection<C extends Comment,T extends CommentCollectionConfiguration>
extends BaseSocialComponent
implements CommentCollection<C,T>
    Base SocialComponentCollection class which maintains a list of Comment.
